data.Sentence_cn: 4年以后，奥林匹克运动会将在我们国家举行。
data.Sentence: The Olympic Games will be held in our country in four years' time.

data.Sentence_cn: 由于将有大批的人到我们国家来，所以政府准备建造一些新的饭店、一个大型体育场和一个新的奥运会标准游泳池。
data.Sentence: As a great many people will be visiting the country,the government will be building new hotels, an immense stadium,and a new Olympic-standard swimming pool.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们还将修筑一些新的道路和一条铁路专线。
data.Sentence: They will also be building new roads and a special railway line.

data.Sentence_cn: 奥运会就在首都市郊举办，整个地区将被称作“奥林匹克城”。
data.Sentence: The Games will be held just outside the capital and the whole area will be called 'Olympic City'.

data.Sentence_cn: 工人们将在今年年底前把新路铺好；
data.Sentence: Workers will have completed the new roads by the end of this year.

data.Sentence_cn: 到明年年底，他们将把新体育场建成。
data.Sentence: By the end of next year, they will have finished work on the new stadium.

data.Sentence_cn: 这些巨大的现代化建筑是由库尔特.冈特设计的。
data.Sentence: The fantastic modern buildings have been designed by Kurt Gunter.

data.Sentence_cn: 大家都将急切地注视着新建筑的建成。
data.Sentence: Everybody will be watching anxiously as the new buildings go up.

data.Sentence_cn: 我们都非常激动，盼望着奥运会的到来，
data.Sentence: We are all very excited and are looking forward to the Olympic Games

data.Sentence_cn: 因为在这个国家里还从未举办过奥运会。
data.Sentence: because they have never been held before in this country.
